item.title: The Fan Mail Project
item.description: What is the nature of our perceived separation and differences with “art” / “the artist”? Are there boundaries to an artistic practice? By writing fan letters, we hope to unpack, explore and embody the experience of the “distant” admirer. Does “art” need to be demystified? Inspired by Franck Leibovici, we inquire into the “forms of life” behind the artwork and the artist. Additionally, we experiment with the genre of fan mail.
